name: Bio Evil: Z Lab
description:
The whole world is falling apart. Viral outbreak reaches all parts of the globe. Try your best to survive. Build and upgrade your lab to battle enemies -- Bio Evils.
In this game, your infected units are your key to defeating enemies. Create an invincible institute with your friends to challenge players all around the world. Only you can lead us to survive in this turbulent world.

Features:
Build and defense base, customize units to battle enemies and collect resources
Navigate the vast world to smash zombies. The last one survive, the one rule.
Tactically deploy multiple experts to increase the power of your units.
Rally members against enemy and march against PVP bully.
Achieve various events goals to win abundant rewards.
Real-time translation feature brings tens of thousands of players worldwide together!
Combine microbes with animals, deploy infected to defeat enemies.

Embark on the journey to survive in this cruel world. Who will be the last one standing, you can tell us.......

Like Bio Evil: Z Lab on Facebook to get news and updates :
https://www.facebook.com/bioevilzlab/
Contact us via bio_en@mummut.com if you need help
